page.title: 15A Truck Driving Mum
page.content: Ten years ago my mum was working for a firm called Warners Transport, driving a small 35 cwt.van. One day Mr.Warner sent her to Hereford where there is the Transport Training School.After 10 days of lessons,Mum passed the test to get her Class One H.G.V. Licence. I passed mine also, by proxy, because at that time my mum was expecting a baby, who turned out to be me. When I was 14 months old, mum and I hit the road to become full-time truck driver and mate.We travelled all over the country and even went to Germany. Mum even managed to potty train me in the lorry,and used to read to me if we had to wait for loading and unloading.When I was 3, mum thought it was time for me to go to playschool. So on playschool days I stayed with Aunty Hilary and went to school with Rachael.
